::Feline::
She blushed slightly as HotRod kissed her hand. "I'm pleased to meet 
you."

::KitKat::

She heard Drilbit's words in the back of her mind. She said yes, but 
it was in her mind only.  She couldn't feel her body anymore.
She stayed in stasis lock. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He took her hand, and kissed it.
> "I am Hot Rod."
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Come on, love. Come back to me." He took her hand, and leened in, 
to
> wisper to her.
> "I ask your hand, in the joining."
> 
> OOC: DrillBit is really giving KitKat something to fight for. He is
> proposing marrige to her. I just tryed to make is sound "alien" with
> that "joining" stuff.
